title: Replaying a Game
body: After a game, I think I replayed a game by accident. I pressed alt F4 and I am now back at the home screen. I can still hear the replay music and effects going on though such as "An ally has been slain." I cannot find the tab that is replaying everything though. am checking all of my tabs and what not, and none of them seems to be the replay.

replies.body: This sounds like an issue you'll want to bring up on the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  Any details can help our client devs reproduce this and look for a fix.  Thanks for the report!
